interactivity.requirements: Saturday Seen day272 - (Unlisted event, autoplays during a weekday after seeing What Was ) You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " What Was " Seen " Where the Sidewalk Ends " from Yumi Yamaguchi
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Call Chika on Saturday morning after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Sensei is ready to take up Chika 's invitation to go on an overnight vacation to a hot spring. Once they arrive, they meet Tsukasa Tsukioka and her mother Tsubasa — Sensei recognises them as the richest family in town , although Touka isn't with them today. Tsubasa deduces that Sensei and Chika are "together", but doesn't seem bothered by it. Sensei and Chika go their room. Chika asks how Sensei feels about being her "first" tonight — but not quite yet, because she wants to go relax in the hot spring to mentally prepare herself.
trivia: If the player views this event before viewing the event Abyss , they will fail the event Things That Hurt !!

changelog: This Event was added in Update .15p1.
